item.description: They should call it the Gnome Ore Nerfs March
item.content:encoded: They should call it the Gnome Ore Nerfs March

item.title: By: Brant
item.dc:creator: Brant
item.description:
The Blizzard Downloader is actually useful for one thing: Before it starts downloading, it checks to see if the patch files are already there, and then verifies that they haven't been modified from the originals before resuming the download or starting to patch the game.
If you want to snag the patch from a mirror, just put the files in the World Of Warcraft folder in the exact same spot the downloader would put them, and then start the downloader. If the files were modified (infected), the downloader will only get what it needs to 'fix' them. If the stuff you grabbed is legit, the downloader will just go ahead and patch the game.
item.content:encoded:
The Blizzard Downloader is actually useful for one thing: Before it starts downloading, it checks to see if the patch files are already there, and then verifies that they haven’t been modified from the originals before resuming the download or starting to patch the game.

If you want to snag the patch from a mirror, just put the files in the World Of Warcraft folder in the exact same spot the downloader would put them, and then start the downloader. If the files were modified (infected), the downloader will only get what it needs to ‘fix’ them. If the stuff you grabbed is legit, the downloader will just go ahead and patch the game.

item.title: By: Yunk
item.dc:creator: Yunk
item.content:encoded:
I truly have trouble feeling sorry for warriors now that they are on equal footing with rogues. They’ll have to use their leet skillz instead of their gear. oh snap did I say that?

I’m happy pets get buffed. Maybe that stupid human boy
they gave me for a minion will now be able to tank properly!

item.title: By: Heather
item.dc:creator: Heather
item.content:encoded:
“When casting a buff on a low level target, the appropriate rank of the buff will automatically be applied.”

How sad is it that this is the note I love the most? Class balance–eh, whatever, I have fun playing through it all. But the little annoyances drive me batty. Guess it also goes to show that I haven’t been playing as much lately.

Guess I’d better go see if I can find updated mods at all, or whether curse gaming is totally hosed. Thanks for posting these.

item.title: By: MMODump.com » Burning Crusade Launches Today, Sorta Kinda Maybe
item.dc:creator: MMODump.com » Burning Crusade Launches Today, Sorta Kinda Maybe
item.description: [...] There’s lots of, as expected, wailing and gnashing of teeth as befits a revamp of PvP, talents and UI code. But imagine dealing with all that AND getting new zones online. Yeah. Preloading as much expansion content as possible before ship - not that bad an idea. [...]

item.title: By: Indy
item.dc:creator: Indy
item.description:
It was the warrior whining over rage normalization that inspired this observation:
The optimist sees the glass of milk and says 'It's half-full', the pessimist says 'It's half-empty.' The WoW player says "Milk was nerfed."
item.content:encoded:
It was the warrior whining over rage normalization that inspired this observation:

The optimist sees the glass of milk and says ‘It’s half-full’, the pessimist says ‘It’s half-empty.’ The WoW player says “Milk was nerfed.”

item.title: By: Pougen
item.dc:creator: Pougen
item.description:
Drokthul needs to get laid, IMO. That guy is always such a jerk on the forums - even to people with legitimate issues. I always wonder if guys like feel they must exercise their e-peen so stridently because they are losers in real life.
On with they protest!
item.content:encoded:
Drokthul needs to get laid, IMO. That guy is always such a jerk on the forums – even to people with legitimate issues. I always wonder if guys like feel they must exercise their e-peen so stridently because they are losers in real life.

On with they protest!
